about:
Hi, I'm Soren! I'm a recent graduate of the Master's program in Natural Language Processing at UC Santa Cruz.

During my time there, I TA'd several courses in AI and Information Systems. I've also spent a lot of time in people-facing roles, which shaped how I communicate, teach, and collaborate, whether that's working with students or coaching in board sports.

Lately, I've focused on building agent-based AI systems, especially tools that align language models with real-world needs. I've worked across backend infrastructure, product design, and LLM prototyping at startups like Gray Whale, and I formerly worked at Onda Sports. I also previously developed features for the surf marketplace app Boardal.

I love collaborating on projects that mix practicality with innovation, especially in NLP and AI. Always happy to connect about anything from multi-agent orchestration to surfing!
